name: AHK_Smart_Orchestrator
description: Intelligently orchestrates file detection, analysis, and viewing operations to minimize redundant tool calls. Automatically chains detect → analyze → read → edit workflow with smart caching. Reduces tool calls from 7-10 down to 3-4 by maintaining session context. Now includes debug mode for orchestration transparency.

changelog.2.0.0: Added debugMode parameter for orchestration visibility, enhanced decision logging

intent.description: High-level description of what you want to do (e.g., 'edit the _Dark class checkbox methods')

filePath.description: Optional: Direct path to AHK file (skips detection if provided)

targetEntity.description: Optional: Specific class, method, or function name to focus on (e.g., '_Dark', '_Dark.ColorCheckbox')

operation.description: Operation type: view (read-only), edit (prepare for editing), analyze (structure only)

forceRefresh.description: Force re-analysis even if cached data exists

debugMode.description: Show orchestration decision log with tool call rationales, cache status, and timing info. Useful for understanding why certain tools were called.

text.description: Contains both normal output AND debug section separated by markers
